trans-unit.source: When Balduvian Horde enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a card at random.

trans-unit.resname: PWOR·2019 | Crucible of Worlds | Card Text
trans-unit.source: You may play lands from your graveyard.

trans-unit.resname: PWOR·2019 | Crucible of Worlds | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Greatness is forged in fire and fervor.
